segment.source: How to Customize an Application Virtualization System in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Customize an Application Virtualization System in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Customize an Application Virtualization System in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Customize an Application Virtualization System in the Server Management Console

segment.source: How to Customize an Application Virtualization System in the Server Management Console
segment.target: How to Customize an Application Virtualization System in the Server Management Console

segment.source: You can choose a variety of options to customize an Application Virtualization System.
segment.target: You can choose a variety of options to customize an Application Virtualization System.

segment.source: These options are available through the user interface of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: These options are available through the user interface of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: How to Set Up and Enable or Disable Authentication
segment.target: How to Set Up and Enable or Disable Authentication

segment.source: Provides procedures you can use to establish the levels of authentication for defining who has access to the system.
segment.target: Provides procedures you can use to establish the levels of authentication for defining who has access to the system.

segment.source: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting
segment.target: How to Set Up or Disable Usage Reporting

segment.source: Provides procedures for setting up or disabling usage reporting.
segment.target: Provides procedures for setting up or disabling usage reporting.

segment.source: How to Set Up or Disable Database Size
segment.target: How to Set Up or Disable Database Size

segment.source: Provides procedures for setting up the database size limits and determining when the server will clean up the database.
segment.target: Provides procedures for setting up the database size limits and determining when the server will clean up the database.

segment.source: How to Set Up or Disable Application Licensing
segment.target: How to Set Up or Disable Application Licensing

segment.source: Provides procedures for setting up or disabling application licensing.
segment.target: Provides procedures for setting up or disabling application licensing.

segment.source: How to Add an Administrator Group
segment.target: How to Add an Administrator Group

segment.source: Provides a procedure for adding an administrator group.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for adding an administrator group.

segment.target: How to Delete an Administrator Group

segment.target: Provides a procedure for deleting an administrator group.
